definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: You can put pig's belly or lean meat in the steamed sandwich, which can beat McDonald's Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 割包可以選五花肉或瘦肉，中國的漢堡不輸麥當勞。

sentences.english: Cut into streaky pork thin slice, bean curd slice, bottom go into boil of pot in.
sentences.chinese: 將五花肉切成薄片，豆腐切片，下入煮沸的鍋中。

sentences.english: This dish "Preserved Vegetables with Pork Belly" is easy to make.
sentences.chinese: 今天的梅菜五花肉其實很簡單，是星期三的晚餐之一。

sentences.english: How do you choose pork belly?
I prefer to eat here baked wild-pigs, very sweet.
sentences.chinese: 我比較喜歡喫這裏烤的五花肉，很香。

sentences.english: Local experts believe the price of pork belly in South Korea will continue to soar in a short period of time.
sentences.chinese: 韓國專家表示，韓五花肉價格短期內還將持續走高。

definition: pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
